oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate $2 bill
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Third series paper currency issued at Richmond. Front side engraved in center with an allegorical representation of the South striking at the Union. Upper left corner bears an image of Confederate statesman Judah P. Benjamin. He served in the Confederate cabinet as Secretary of State, Attorney General, and Secretary of War. Reverse is blank.
